subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Belmont Stakes
Preakness Stakes
lead_paragraph: Animal Kingdom's owners are hoping the 2011 Kentucky Derby winner can end a dismal run for U.S.-based horses in the Dubai World Cup at the Meydan Race Course on Saturday.
snippet: Animal Kingdom's owners are hoping the 2011 Kentucky Derby winner can end a dismal run for U.S.-based horses in the Dubai World Cup at the Meydan Race Course on Saturday.
